name: Weed Firm: Memories
description:
Running a successful weed firm has taken its toll on expelled botany sophomore Ted Growing.

After everything he’s been through, Ted is ready to put his pots away and enjoy a well-deserved vacation on a tropical island. He has everything he needs to relax under the Caribbean sun of Ganja island. He's got his:

- beach chair
- sunglasses
- and an amazing chilled herbal tea in his hand

He's got everything he needs, but wait...something's missing. He can't remember what it is, he needs to weed through its mind, but… something is definitely missing indeed.

Don't get too relaxed on Ganja beach, bro! Your potting work isn’t over just yet!

In this memory-matching game based on the legendary business simulation game Weed Firm: RePlanted, you are faced with a seemingly simple task. You need to memorize and match exact pairs of all your old clients from the original Weed Firm. The gang's all here: Jane the Dancer, that infamous Mooch Ryan, Jezebel the spooky goth, Bob the Rasta, and many more!

As you partake in the memory matching madness you will:

+ Race against time; putting your memory and concentration to use as you match pairs of cards.
+ Face diversions in the form of and snarky commentary as Ted's colorful pot clientele tease you.
+ Get the munchies! The faster you are, the more tasty cupcakes you collect to boost you to the next level. 

You'll never be bored as you blaze through levels of ever-increasing difficulty in your fight against that eternal arch-enemy himself: Father Time! Help Ted free his weed clients from the clutches of oblivion so he can leave the shop and rush back to his beach chair!

Good luck and happy memories! Enjoy your throw back to Weed Firm!
